sub_title: Professor Cellular and Translational Cardiology at UMC Utrecht
summary:
In my lab, we are focussing on cardiac regeneration thereby studying molecular signal changes after cardiac injury and identifying new therapeutic strategies to stimulate the endogenous repair mechanisms of the heart or by using cell-based transplantation therapies to replace the damaged myocardium.

Specialties: planning, executing, and managing experimental basic and pre-clinical cardiovascular research
